resources.string: You Can only Add up to 4 Contacts.You can delete a contact by long pressing on it
Accident Detected and S.O.S Message sent successfully
How it Works ? \n Click here to Know

This App uses accelerometer sensor to detect Accident and Sends an S.O.S. Message to Your added Emergency Contacts with Your Current Location. If You are travelling with 2 wheeler it is suggested to keep your phone in pocket and if you are travelling in a car it is recommended to keep your phone on dashboard. After Detecting Accident this app ask for confirmation that is it a accident or not with a timer of 30 seconds if it does not gets any response within 30 seconds it sends S.O.S message automatically.
